title: Chess Genius v2.5.0
description:
ChessGenius, award winning chess program. The author's chess programs have won ten World Championships.

Features:

-Display of thinking
-Hint
-Tutor
-Full take back & forward
-Chess clocks
-Big opening book & named openings
-Set up position
-33 playing levels including easy & blitz
-Database. Save / load games to PGN databases on SD card
-Copy and paste PGN games to clipboard
-Simple, elegant user interface

What's New:

High resolution graphics
Stronger play. Engine is 25% to 80% faster.
Swipe (outside of chess board) left/right for shortcut to takeback/step forward.
Now supports English, German, French, Italian and Spanish.
Better support for Tablets.

More info:
 <a href="
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.chessgenius.android.chess" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.chessgenius.android.chess</a>
